title: Buying and selling cats and dogs & keeping cats at home - Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: as for the question that deals with the cat the prophet had a cat and he used to give the cat water to drink and he would say that this is among the uh the ones that intermingle with you so it is pure it is halal to keep in the house it is forbidden to buy or to sell cats it's forbidden to buy or to sell dogs and this is the authentic Hadith of the Prophet Alam
